opulent.name: Opulence
opulent.description: they have a lot of money and they like to show it off.

wealthy.name: Wealthy
wealthy.description: they have a comfortable amount of money and they can afford to buy nice things.

prosperous.name: Prosperous
prosperous.description: they have a decent amount of money and they can afford to buy most things.

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.description: they have a moderate amount of money and they can afford to buy some things.

modest.name: Modest
modest.description: they have a small amount of money and they can afford to buy basic things.

impoverished.name: Impoverished
impoverished.description: they have very little money and they can barely afford to buy anything.

destitute.name: Destitute
destitute.description: they have no money and they can't afford to buy anything.
